name: Movie Tribond Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: Ted Danson, Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore?
questions.explanation:
Saving Private Ryan.

	They were all in Saving Private Ryan, Ted Danson had a small part and he did speak and it's hard to mistake his voice.

questions.text: Robin Williams, Joan Cusack, LL Cool J?
Julie Andrews, Larry Hagman, Loretta Swit?
questions.explanation:
S.O.B.

	The movie most famous scene is when Julie Andrews goes Topless.
